alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Citrus, northwestern Pasco and western Hernando Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hudson, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spring Hill, Homosassa Springs, Hudson, Weeki Wachee, Homosassa, Jasmine Estates, Weeki Wachee Gardens, Pine Island, North Weeki Wachee, Timber Pines, New Port Richey East, Sugarmill Woods, Royal Highlands, Lecanto, High Point, Leisure Acres, Shady Hills, Glen Lakes, Bayonet Point and Brookridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Pasco
